fields.label: Custom Lock Message
fields.name: go_lock_message
fields.placeholder: Optional message to display when locked.

fields.label: Show Password Box
fields.name: go_password_lock
fields.instructions: Show a box to users for a password. This will prompt them to get a password from a teacher or provide instructions in the lock message field above on how to get the password elsewhere in the game. The master password that is set in the options page will work here, but you may also set another password that is specific to this lock.

sub_fields.instructions: Leave blank to have the title automaticall set to "quest name-stage #"
